actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: Urging the Administration to work with North Atlantic Treaty Organization member states to invoke Article 5 of the North Atlantic Treaty in response to the Paris attacks.

summary.text: Calls on the President, in response to the Paris attacks, to work closely with other North Atlantic Treaty Organization members to invoke Article 5 of the North Atlantic Treaty (which states that "The Parties agree that an armed attack against one or more of them in Europe or North America shall be considered an attack against them all . . . .").

titles.title: Urging the Administration to work with North Atlantic Treaty Organization member states to invoke Article 5 of the North Atlantic Treaty in response to the Paris attacks.
